survey_name: Adoption and Satisfaction of AI-Powered Personal Nutrition Planning Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand the adoption rates and satisfaction levels of users who have tried AI-powered personal nutrition planning tools.

questions.question_text: Have you ever used an AI-powered personal nutrition planning tool?
questions.client_notes: This question helps segment users and non-users for further questions.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: Have you ever used an AI-powered personal nutrition planning tool?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current AI-powered nutrition planning tool?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using'
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current AI-powered nutrition planning tool?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using'

questions.question_text: What features do you find most useful in an AI-powered nutrition planning tool? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using' or 'Yes, but no longer using'
questions.client_notes: This helps identify which features are most valued by users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection and include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you find most useful in an AI-powered nutrition planning tool? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using' or 'Yes, but no longer using'

questions.question_text: What factors would encourage you to try an AI-powered nutrition planning tool?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'No, but interested in trying'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative insights on motivators.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for respondents to type their answers.

script.question_text: What factors would encourage you to try an AI-powered nutrition planning tool?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'No, but interested in trying'

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered nutrition planning tools?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using' or 'Yes, but no longer using'
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather feedback for product improvement.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for respondents to type their answers.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for AI-powered nutrition planning tools?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q1 is 'Yes, currently using' or 'Yes, but no longer using'
